body:
Hello everyone,
I just wanted to tell everyone that I have decided to make a consulting service thing through which I can still help the community. Since I have straight A's, am in National Honor Society, and am a passed Admin, I think I am qualified to consult players, and even staff on this server. I would like to cover topics of all kinds, from school (tutoring), to social (girls/boys), to even advice on how to get a mod to like you (really anything besides pvp). I have privately consulted numerous people in real life, and on this server in the past. I think that it would be a good idea to just open up to the rest of the community and offer everyone this service. Im really just looking for a way to past time when Im lonely on my computer xD, so I think this would be a great way to give back to some members of the community.
Please post below, or add me on Skype (gilletteracer) if you are interested.
Thank you for your time,
Maxs
body_tagged:

I appreciate what happened yesterday, by the way. ;3

replies.body: When getting a girlfriend, what sort of rope would you recommend?

replies.body: Give this man a Teamspeak channel!
replies.body_tagged: Give this man a Teamspeak channel!

replies.body:
+1, but only he has power to add people to the channel. I would say that not even Ivy or anyone else would be able to because private information may be said throughout the course of the talk.

Great idea though, it's always nice to be able to talk to someone you don't know irl about your problems because they'll have an unbiased opinion.
